name: musical-notation
description: Simple and lightweight musical notation based on beat sequencers and inspired by good ideas.

scripts.gitpush: git add .; git commit -m "Build, Transpile, Publish, Release"; npm version minor; git push;
scripts.prepare: npm run es6mod; npm run gitpush;
scripts.save: git add .; git commit -m 'New Release'; git push; npm version patch; npm publish; git push;

author: fantasyui.com <fantasyui.com@gmail.com>
